channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15083] Gets from Multiactions are not counted in metrics for gets.
item.description: RSRpcServices#get updates the get metrics. However Multiactions do not.
item.summary: Gets from Multiactions are not counted in metrics for gets.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: make a simple patch.
And i notice the metrics in doBatchOp is updated for the all mutations. Is it right?

-1 overall

Heng Chen when committing, the Fix Version should be the next unrelease version on that release branch. For example, the next release of 1.1.x will be 1.1.3, so this fix for should be 1.1.3, not 1.1.0. I believe I've updated the field correctly, but please double-check.
Oh, sorry, i got it now. Thanks for your pointing out.
Bulk closing 1.1.3 issues.
